title: Peppers Heritage Southern Highlands Escape 90 Minutes From Sydney
description: You won’t have to venture far from Sydney’s CBD to experience old-world charm and country tranquility in this boutique manor-style stay. Surrounded by Southern Highland flora and adjacent to a championship golf course, guests are spoiled with opportunities to embrace nature. For dining, the award-winning Katers Restaurant is close at hand, serving nostalgic country fare against roaring wood fireplaces, and the onsite bar and pool table make for a cosy wind-down.
offer_address: Kater Road, Sutton Forest, New South Wales 2577, Australia
